tuv.seg: Ireland is a popular destination for those interested in learning English
Is áit choitianta í Éire le haghaidh daoine a mbíonn suim acu Béarla a fhoghlaim

There are many schools and courses available throughout the country that cater for everyone from business executives and students who want to improve their English language proficiency, to those who want to learn how to teach English as a foreign language

Tá go leor scoileanna agus cúrsaí ar fud na tíre do gach duine, idir fheidhmeannaigh ghnó agus daltaí atá ag iarraidh feabhais a chur ar a gcuid Béarla agus daoine atá ag iarraidh foghlaim conas Béarla a mhúineadh mar theanga iasachta
The majority of English-as-a-foreign-language (EFL) schools in Ireland are privately run and provide students with a full package of tuition, homestay accommodation and extra-curricular activities

Is scoileanna príobháideacha iad formhór na scoileanna Béarla mar theanga iasachta (EFL) in Éirinn agus ofráileann siad pacáiste lán, le teagasc, lóistín agus gníomhíochtaí sa bhreis ar churaclam san áireamh
The majority of schools offer preparation programmes for the major English language examinations, such as TOEFL, IELTS, Cambridge and Trinity College (London)
Bíonn cúrsaí ullmhúcháin ag formhór na scoileanna seo do na mór-scrúduithe Béarla, ar nós TOEFL, IELTS, Cambridge agus Coláiste na Tríonóide (Londain)

TEFL (Teaching English as a Foreign Language) programmes are also available at many private schools and a number of universities (University College Dublin, University College Cork, NUI Galway, Dublin City University agus University of Limerick

Tá cúrsaí TEFL (An Béarla a Mhúineadh mar Theanga Iasachta) ar fáil i go leor scoileanna príobháideacha agus roinnt Ollscoileanna (Ollscoil na hÉireann, BÁC, Ollscoil na hÉireann Corcaí, OÉ Gaillimh, Ollscoil Chathair Bhaile Átha Cliath agus Ollscoil Luimní
Accreditation and Co-ordination of English Language Services
Creidiúnú agus Comhordú Seirbhísí Teagaisc an Bhéarla
It is important to ensure that high standards exist throughout the EFL sector and that courses in EFL schools in Ireland are comparable with other international courses
Tá sé tábhachtach ardchaighdeán sa roinn EFL a chinntiú agus a dhéanamh deimhin de go bhfuil na cúrsaí sna scoileanna Éireannacha ar chomhchéim leis na cinn idirnáisiúnta
The Department of Education and Skills has given Accreditation and Co-ordination of English Language Services (ACELS) the responsibility for monitoring the EFL sector
Thug an Roinn Oideachais agus Scileanna freagracht do Creidiúnú agus Comhordú Seirbhísí Teagaisc an Bhéarla (CCSTB) le féachaint i ndiaidh na rannóga EFL
Since January 2011 ACELS is part of Quality and Qualifications Ireland (QQI)
Ó Eanáir 2011 is é CCSTB cuid den Dearbhú Cáilíochta agus Cáilíochtaí Éireann (DCCE)
The list of recognised EFL schools and organisations in Ireland is published on an annual basis and is available on the ACELS web site
Foilsítear liosta na scoileanna agus eagraíochtaí aitheanta EFL in Éirinn ar bhonn bliantúil agus tá sé ar fáil ar shuíomh idirlín an CCSTB
Regulations governing EFL schools
Rialacha ag baint le scoileanna EFL
New schools receive two inspection visits, 10 months apart
Tugtar cuairt ar scoileanna nua faoi dhó le briseadh 10 mí idir an dá chuairt
ACELS will inspect existing schools at least once every three years to make sure that they are adhering to the regulations
Bíonn scrúdú ag scoileanna aitheanta ar a laghad uair amháin i ngach 3 bliana chun a chinntiú go bhfuil siad ag cloí leis na rialacha
While this is normal practice, it has the authority to visit or inspect a school at all reasonable times
Sin a tharlaíonn go hiondúil, ach is féidir le CCSTB cuairt a thabhairt ar scoil ag aon am réasúnta
ACELS has a number of criteria that it uses to determine if a school is worthy of official recognition, which includes the following:
Tá critéir faoi leith ag CCSTB a n-úsáidtear chun scoileanna a mheas maidir le haitheantas oifigiúil
• All premises used by the school must comply with the Schedule of Required Standards prepared by ACELS
• Caithfidh na háitribh aontú le Sceideal na gCaighdeán Riachtanach a bhíonn ullmhaithe ag CCSTB
These standards include local authority requirements in planning, construction, water supply, sewage disposal, fire precautions and general safety
I measc na gcaighdeán seo tá riachtanais an Údaráis áitiúil ó thaobh pleanála, tógála, sóláthar uisce, córas séarachais, réamhchúram tine agus slándáil ghinearálta de
Schools must also be properly heated and ventilated and provide adequate facilities (learning and recreational) for students
Caithfidh teas agus aerú ceart a bheith sna scoileanna chomh maith le háiseanna foghlamtha agus siamsaíochta do scoláirí
• Schools must have the correct public and employer liability insurance cover and all employment legislation and health and safety legislation must be complied with
• Caithfidh scoileanna árachas cuí dliteanas phoiblí agus fostóra a bheith acu agus caithfidh siad cloí le reachtaíocht fhostaíochta agus reachtaíocht sláinte agus sábháilteachta
Safety statements and logs must be available for inspection
Caithfidh ráitis sábháilteachta agus tuairiscí a bheith ar fáil le haghaidh scrúdaithe
• Schools must adhere to all the immigration requirements for students laid down by the Department of Justice and Equality
• Caithfidh scoileanna cloí le riachtanais inimirce na ndaltaí mar atá leagtha síos ag an Roinn Dlí agus Cirt agus Comhionannais
• The courses provided by schools must be educationally sound and have content appropriate to their stated objectives
• Ba cheart bonn maith oideachasúil a bheith ag na cúrsaí a chuireann na scoileanna ar fáil agus an t-ábhar a bheith oiriúnach dá gcuid cuspóirí luaite
• Course programmes should clearly state the number of tuition hours
• Ba cheart méid uaireanta teagaisc na gcúrsaí a bheith curtha in iúl go soiléir ar an gclár
The number of hours should normally not be less than 15 per week
Go hiondúil, ní cheart go mbeadh níos lú ná 15 uair an chloig teagaisc sa tseachtain i gceist
• Students should be placed in class according to competence and age and there should normally be no more than 15 students per class
• Ba cheart dalta a chur i rang a oireann dá (h)aois agus dá c(h)umas agus ní cheart níos mó ná 15 dalta a bheith sa rang
• A complete schedule of supervised activities must form an essential part of all junior programmes
• Caithfidh sceideal iomlán imeachtaí stiúrtha a bheith mar chuid riachtanach de gach clár sóisearach
• If it is appropriate, the school's courses should reflect Irish life and culture
• Má tá sé feiliúnach, ba cheart saol na hÉireann agus an saol cultúrtha a bheith le braistint sna cúrsaí
• All teachers working in language schools must have a Level 7 degree and taken a recognised EFL certificate course
• Caithfidh céim leibhéal 7 a bheith ag gach múinteoir ag obair i scoileanna teanga chomh maith le cúrsa teastais EFL aitheanta déanta acu
• The school must make sure that arrangements are in place for teacher induction and that ongoing teacher development is provided
• Caithfidh na scoileanna déanamh cinnte go bhfuil socruithe i bhfeidhm le hinsealbhú múinteoirí agus forbairt leanúna na múinteoirí a chothú
• Each school must have a person with appropriate skills, experience and qualifications in the field of academic management to deal with the needs of the curriculum
• Caithfidh duine le scileanna, taithí agus cáilíochtaí sa bhainistíocht acadúil a bheadh in ann déileáil le riachtanais an churaclaim a bheith i ngach scoil
This person must be available to students and staff during a normal working day
Caithfidh an duine seo a bheith ar fáil d'fhoireann na scoile agus do na daltaí i gcaitheamh an lae oibre
• All information contained in advertising and promotional material (brochures, etc.) must be clear, accurate and verifiable
• Caithfidh an t-eolas ar fad a bhíonn in aon ábhar fógraíochta (bróisiúir & rl) a bheith soiléir, cruinn agus fíor
• In circumstances where students are referred to other organisations for tuition, the organisations must be recognised by ACELS as an English Language Teaching Organisation
• Nuair a chuirtear daltaí ar aghaidh chuig eagraíochtaí eile le haghaidh teagaisc, caithfidh aitheantas ón CCSTB le haghaidh Béarla a mhúineadh mar Theanga Iasachta a bheith ag an eagraíocht
ACELS may at any time withdraw recognition from an organisation
D'fhéadfadh CCSTB aitheantas a bhaint ó eagraíocht ar bith
Refusal/withdrawal of recognition from one centre may, at the discretion of ACELS, lead to the refusal/withdrawal of recognition from an organisation as a whole
Má bhaintear/má dhiúltaítear aitheantas d'ionad faoi leith, is féidir, le discréid CCSTB, aitheantas a bhaint/a dhiúltiú don eagraíocht ar fad
• Only centres that have been inspected by ACELS at specified addresses and for which recognition has been obtained can be advertised in publicity material claiming recognition by ACELS

• Ní féidir le hionaid nach bhfuil scrúdaithe ag CCSTB ag seoltaí faoi leith agus nach bhfuil aitheantas faighte acu, fógraíocht a dhéanamh in ábhar poiblíochta ag rá go bhfuil aitheantas acu ón CCSTB
Requirements for host family accommodation
Riachtanais do theaghlaigh a chuireann lóistín ar fáil
If accommodation is organised by the school, it must meet the required standards for host family accommodation or residential accommodation
Má bhíonn an lóistín eagraithe ag an scoil, caithfidh sé caighdeán áirithe do theaghlaigh nó lóistín cónaithe a shroichint
The first requirement is that the student should be well looked after and treated as a member of the family during his or her stay
Caithfear aire mhaith a thabhairt don dalta agus é/í a ligint a bheith mar pháirt den teaghlach agus é/í ag fanacht le teaghlach
The following facilities should be made available to the student:
Caithfear na háiseanna seo a leanas a chur ar fáil don dalta:
• A comfortable bed with good supply of quality bedclothes and weekly change of bed linen
• Leaba chompórdach le sóláthar maith d'éadach maith agus athrú éadaigh leapan uair sa tseachtain
• Adequate space for clothes storage
• Dóthain spáis le haghaidh stóras éadaí
• Laundry or reasonable access to a washing machine
• Níochán éadaí nó cead an meaisín níocháin a úsáid
• Table and chair in bedroom for private study or access at all times to another room with study facilities
• Bord agus cathaoir don staidéar príobháideach sa seomra codlata nó a bheith in ann seomra eile a úsáid am ar bith le háiseanna staidéir
• Free access to a bathroom and bath or shower daily
• Bheith in ann an seomra folctha a úsáid am ar bith agus folcadh nó cith folctha a bheith acu gach lá
• Adequate heating, lighting and ventilation
• Teas, solas agus aerú ceart
Each host family can accommodate up to three students, but only one student of any particular mother tongue
• Is féidir le gach teaghlach triúr dalta a choimeád, ach caithfidh teangacha difriúla ó dhúchas a bheith ag gach dalta
There should only be two students to a room at any time and a well-balanced and varied diet should be provided
Ní cheart níos mó ná beirt a bheith in aon seomra amháin agus caithfear béilí éagsúla agus bia maith a shóláthar dóibh
EFL organisations offering residential programmes are required to have the accommodation approved by Fáilte Ireland - (the National Tourism Development Board for the island of Ireland)
Caithfear aitheantas a fháil ó Bhord Fáilte chun an lóistín a chur ar fáil do na daltaí seo
Further details are available from ACELS and schools must carry out regular checks on the accommodation they provide for students
Is féidir tuilleadh eolais a fháil ó CCSTB agus caithfidh na scoileanna na tithe lóistín a scrúdú go rialta
The purpose of TEFL courses is to familiarise candidates with current practices in teaching English as a foreign language
Tá sé mar aidhm ag cúrsaí TEFL iarrathóirí a chur ar an eolas maidir le Béarla a mhúineadh mar theanga iasachta
Courses also instruct candidates how to construct and teach a series of lessons appropriate to the level and needs of language learners
Faigheann iarrthóirí amach conas ceachtanna a ullmhú agus a mhúineadh ag an léibhéal cuí, ag brath ar riachtanais na ndaltaí
TEFL courses are run in many private schools and a number of universities
Tá fáil ar chúrsaí TEFL i go leor scoileanna príobháideacha agus roinnt ollscoileanna
They range from basic introductory courses to courses designed to prepare candidates for the workplace
Ar fáil, tá cúrsaí do thosaitheoirí chomh maith le cúrsaí a ullmhaíonn iarrthóirí don láthair oibre
More in-depth courses aimed at TEFL professionals interested in further professional development are also available from both private schools and universities
Tá dianchúrsaí ar fáil chomh maith i scoileanna príobháideacha agus ollscoileanna do dhaoine le cáilíochtaí gairmiúla TEFL, ar spéis leo forbairt bhreise phroifisiúnta
Test of Interactive English
Scrúdú ar Bhéarla Idirghníomhach
The Test of Interactive English (TIE) - for English language learners
An Scrúdú ar Bhéarla Idirghníomhach (TIE) - a chruthú agus a chur i gcrích d'fhoghlaimeoirí an Bhéarla

The test is task-based, with the content chosen by each individual learner, and can therefore be used to assess learners with different needs, such as those learning English for business, academic or general purposes
Mar sin, is féidir le foghlaimeoirí le riachtanais difriúla a mheas leis an scrúdú seo, ar nós daoine atá ag foghlaim Béarla le haghaidh cúrsaí gnó, ar bhonn acadúil nó ar bhonn ginearálta
Learners' communicative and interactive skills are tested in both predictable and spontaneous situations and they must complete both an oral and written exam

Déantar scileanna cumarsáide agus idirghníomhacha na bhfoghlaimeoirí a mheas i gcásanna réamhinste chomh maith le cásanna toiliúla agus bíonn ar na foghlaimeoirí scrúdú béil agus scrúdú scríofa a dhéanamh freisin
The test is offered in two formats:
Tá dhá scrúdú ann:
• The Junior TIE: for English language learners aged 12-18 years
• An TIE Sóisearach: d'fhoghlaimeoirí an Bhéarla idir 12 agus 18 bliana d'aois
• The TIE: for English language learners of 18+ (post secondary)
• An TIE: d'fhoghlaimeoirí an Bhéarla atá 18 bliana d'aois nó níos mó (tar éis meanscolaíochta)

After taking the TIE, each candidate is awarded a certificate, printed with the ACELS logo.The certificate also contains the sentence stating that TIE is recognised by ACELS, a service of QQI which is a statuatory body of the Department of Education and Skills

Bronntar teastas ar gach iarrthóir tar éis an TIE a dhéanamh agus bíonn siombail na CCSTB clóbhuailte ar an teastas. Bíonn abairt ag rá go bhfuil an TIE aitheanta ag an Roinn Oideachais agus Scileanna scríofa ar an teastas chomh maith
Certificates are issued within 10 working days of the test having been taken
Eisítear teastais taobh istigh de 10 lá tar éis an scrúdaithe a dhéanamh
Assessment of the TIE is given according to the Council of Europe's Common Framework Scale of Language Proficiency
Déantar an TIE a mheas bunaithe ar Chomhscála Creatlaí Chomhairle na hEorpa ar Líofacht Teanga
MEI is an industry body, which represents the majority of recognised EFL schools in Ireland
MEI - cumann tionscail a fheidhmíonn ar son formhór na scoileanna aitheanta EFL in Éirinn
All members of MEI are recognised and regulated by ACELS
Tugann an Roinn Oideachais agus Scileanna aitheantas agus treorú do bhaill MEI tríd CCSTB
The functions of MEI can be defined by the following categories, each of which has a sub-committee made up from members of the association:
Is féidir feidhmeanna MEI a shainmhíniú trí mheán na ranna seo a leanas, tá fo-choiste ag gach ceann atá déanta suas de bhaill den chumann:
Complaints about English language schools
Gearáin faoi Scoil Bhéarla mar Theanga Iasachta
If you have any complaints about EFL schools, you should contact ACELS - see 'Where to apply' below, which is responsible for monitoring the standards in these schools
Má bhíonn gearán le déanamh agat faoi scoil EFL, is féidir teangbháil a dhéanamh le CCSTB (féach ‘Cá háit a ndéanfaidh mé iarratas’ thíos), atá freagrach as caighdeáin na scoileanna seo a mheas

Information about fees for the application for the recognition of EFL organisations by ACELS are in the Regulations Governing the Recognition of English Language Teaching Organisations on the ACELS website
Tá faisnéis faoi tháillí iarratais ar aitheantas ag an CCSTB sna Rialacháin Aitheantais Eagraíochtaí Teagaisc Bhéarla ar an suíomh gréasáin CCSTB
EFL organisations applying for recognition must send an official application form to ACELS before the stated deadline
Caithfidh eagraíochtaí ar mhaith leo aitheantas a fháil, iarratas a sheoladh ar fhoirm iarratais oifigiúil chuig CCSTB roimh an sprioclá a bhíonn scríofa ar an bhfoirm
The Test of Interactive English is administered by TIE Examinations Ltd and applications are usually made through the candidates' language school or college
Tá an Scrúdú ar Bhéarla Idirghníomhach riartha ag TIE agus de ghnáth déantar iarratas trí scoil nó coláiste teagaisc an iarrthóra
You can apply using the TIE application form (pdf) and you should make sure that your application is received a minimum of 10 days before the test date so that appropriate arrangements can be made

Is féidir iarratas a dhéanamh ar fhoirm iarratais TIE (pdf) agus ba cheart a dhéanamh cinnte de go mbíonn d'iarratas istigh ar a laghad 10 lá roimh dháta an scrúdaithe, ionas gur féidir na socruithe cuí a dhéanamh
